WikimediaEditorTasksUserCountsCluster.description: Database cluster to use for storing user count data. False means the cluster of the current wiki will be used.

WikimediaEditorTasksUserCountsDatabase.description: Database to use for storing user count data. False means use the database of the current wiki. To use a table prefix, use '<database>-<prefix'>' format.

WikimediaEditorTasksSuggestionDataCluste.description: Database cluster to use for storing task suggestion data. False means the cluster of the current wiki will be used.

WikimediaEditorTasksSuggestionDataDataba.description: Database to use for storing task suggestion data. False means use the database of the current wiki. To use a table prefix, use '<database>-<prefix'>' format.

WikimediaEditorTasksEnabledCounters.description:
Counter classes to enable, with associated configuation. Fields:\n* class: the fully qualified class name\n* counter_key: the count property name associated with the counter, for storing in the DB and surfacing in the MediaWiki API\n* target_counts: target counts associated with this counter\n* delay: delay, in seconds, to apply before passing the counter target takes effect

Example:
{
	"class": "MediaWiki\Extension\WikimediaEditorTasks\WikipediaAppDescriptionEditCounter",
	"counter_key": "app_description_edits",
	"target_counts": [ 5, 50 ],
	"delay": 172800
	}

WikimediaEditorTasksSuggestionSearchSort.description: CirrusSearch sort strategy to use when querying for suggestions. See https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:CirrusSearch#Explicit_sort_orders for possible values.
